DataElement.preferredName: Dental  Removable  Retainer Device Component  Lower Oral Cavity Satisfaction Use  Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Whether the participant is satisfied or dissatisfied with the removable retainer in the lower parts of the mouth

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dental  Removable  Retainer Device Component  Lower Oral Cavity Satisfaction Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The participant's satisfaction with the removable retainer in the lower parts of the mouth

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.:Capable of being taken away.:A physical device designed to hold something in place.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
A physical device designed to hold something in place.

Property.preferredDefinition: Lower; the bottom one of two.:The cavity lying at the upper end of the alimentary canal, bounded on the outside by the lips and inside by the oropharynx and containing in humans the tongue, gums, and teeth.:The feeling of being pleased and content.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: The cavity located at the upper end of the alimentary canal, behind the teeth and gums that is bounded on the outside by the lips, above by the hard and soft palates and below by the tongue.
The feeling of being pleased and content.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
